lead_paragraph: Champion Novak Djokovic was keen to forget his unconvincing  victory over Gilles Simon that put the Serb through to another Australian Open quarter-final but also gave hope to his title rivals.
snippet: Champion Novak Djokovic was keen to forget his unconvincing  victory over Gilles Simon that put the Serb through to another Australian Open quarter-final but also gave hope to his title rivals....

headline.main: Djokovic Suffers 'Brain Freeze' in Simon Scare
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Suffers 'Brain Freeze' in Simon Scare
